_header: Man be also merry as those / And let not many be
_description: First twelve lines of a religious poem in 8-line stanzas

BodArcSelB24.First Lines:
Man be als mery as tho[ ]And lat nocht mony h[
                    ]…
BodArcSelB24.Last Lines:
…Obeye to better men the by [ ]Or thame thy wynnyng han[
                    ]…
BodArcSelB24.Note: Ends of lines lost to damaged gutter.
